name: テンリトルガルフォース
summary: This is a ridiculously wacky parody of those "Making of" documentaries that are all the rage for movies, and is set in the studios where Gall Force: Eternal Story is being shot. Aside from the "behind the scenes" footage there are a number of out-takes and other, strange occurrences happening throughout. Most of the humour is related to the movie, Gall Force: Eternal Story, though, and the relationship between the characters.
info:
• 中文名: 银河女战士 宇宙章
  • 话数: 1
  • 制作: AIC、ムービック
  • 别名: The Ten Little Gall Force
  • 发售日: 1988-07-03

relations.title: ガルフォース ETERNAL STORY
